abstract: Is Goldman Sachs an investment bank? And if so, what does that mean anymore? William D. Cohan and Yves Smith look at what banks used to be, and what they have become.
snippet: Is Goldman Sachs an investment bank? And if so, what does that mean anymore? William D. Cohan and Yves Smith look at what banks used to be, and what they have become.
lead_paragraph: 2:12 p.m. | Updated Is Goldman Sachs even an investment bank anymore? And if so, what does that mean? William D. Cohan and Edward Harrison, in two complementary posts, look at what banks used to be, and what they have become.

headline.main: What Goldman Was, and What It Now Is
